page.title: 18Acton Bridge Parish Room
page.content: Acton Bridge Parish Room was built in 1909, but was extended and modernised in 1983/4. The cost of the extension waas Â£43000 plus Â£9000 for the car park and Â£15000 to renovate the old hall. Money was raised by the village community with dances and other social events. There is a billiard room, cloakroom, kitchen, bar and main function room. Organisations which use th hall are the Youth Club, Women's Institute, Playgroup, Keep Fit Class and Bingo. "At the Youth Club we like to play pool. A B.M.X. course is being built at the back of the hall and we play rounders on the field. Most people in the area think the hall is very good."
